alert.note: Alert for Lenoir (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 9:11PM EDT until April 20 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Neuse River At Kinston affecting Lenoir County. For the Neuse River...including Kinston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neuse River At Kinston. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Water overflows into lowlands adjacent to the river. Water access docks are also affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:01 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:01 PM EDT Sunday was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.5 feet on 03/15/2014. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps.
